question: 獲物
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>seize</kanji>d <kanji>thing</kanji> is something you've seized from your victory. It's your <vocabulary>spoils</vocabulary>. It's your <vocabulary>trophy</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since you didn't learn the kun'yomi for <ja>獲</ja> with the kanji, here's a mnemonic to help you out. <reading>Eh</reading> (<ja>え</ja>)? We won the game? Ehhhh?! No way! To the victor belong the spoils! Yay!
